title: Mrs Harding teaches resourcefully (TEFC)
creator_credit: Tasmanian Film Corporation and John Honey
brief_description: Focuses on the value of resources as teaching aids. It is essential that they be properly stored, preferably centrally, recorded and in good working condition for maximum use.
